title: Video: Big Black Delta – Huggin & Kissin
body:
“And she told me that she loved me and she gave me my money back.

”

Every now and again, I hear an artist that I completely fall for, purchasing every release in sight, pissing off my flatmates with constant repetition of their entire back catalog. Mellowdrone front man, Jonathan Bates, under his (relatively) new moniker **Big Black Delta**, has been on my list of said artists for some time now, ever since I was first introduced to his beautifully twisted and distorted brand of pompous electro-pop supporting **M83** in New York’s Central Park.

His newly released video for track _Huggin & Kissin_ is the perfect introduction to his weird and wonderful world of UFO and space obsession. Between the cat and giant octopus battle and blissful martian family life, I don’t really have much clue what’s going on, but none of that really matters when its sound-tracked by such intensely dirty drums and synths. Ohh baby!

Mellowdrone front man, Jonathan Bates, under his (relatively) new moniker \[…\]
